vinNumHint: look to image to can understand  what is Vin Number
vinInstructionOne: It is a unique number specific to your vehicle. It can be used to provide you with parts that fit your vehicle more accurately. It consists of 17 numbers and English letters and is located on the vehicle registration in the chassis number field.
vinInstructionTwo: It is also located on a metal plate that appears on the edge of the driver's door after it is opened.

returnReplace: Spare Parts Replacement and Return Policy
sevenDaysReplace: Spare parts can be replaced within 7 days from the date of receiving the item, provided that:
cleanPart: The parts are clean, unused, and in their original packaging at the time of purchase.
replacePart: Specially ordered parts for the customer are nonreturnable, non-refundable, and non-exchangeable, as they cannot be sold to another customer.
shippingCost: Shipping Costs for Spare Parts Replacement:
atlobhaAfford: Atlobha covers shipping costs in the following cases:
differenceInpart: If there is a mistake or discrepancy between the part ordered and the part received
correctPartShipped: The correct part will be shipped and replaced for the customer.
clientAfford: The customer bears shipping costs in the following cases:
errorFromCustomer: If the error is from the customer in ordering the part.
noChaseNum: If the chassis number was not provided at the time of the order.
noLongerNeed: If the customer no longer needs the part after it has been shipped.

rightToReview: You have the right to review, update, or delete your data. Contact us at info@atlobha.co for assistance.

questions.q1: How do I complete the purchase process?
questions.a1: The offer validity period is explained along with the required reservation deposit that must be transferred to the dealership to secure the offer price. The dealership will contact you during the validity period to agree on the appropriate payment method for the reservation deposit, followed by a visit to the dealership to finalize the purchase.
questions.q2: What happens if I don't receive any offers?
questions.a2: If no offers are received during the request period, you may request a refund of the service fee. We aim to ensure that every request receives suitable price offers, but this option is provided as a precaution for unexpected circumstances.
questions.q3: Are there any fees for using the Atlobha feature and what payment methods are available?
questions.a3: Yes, there is a small fee for using the Atlobha feature. To enhance your experience and ensure purchase seriousness, we provide multiple payment options including credit cards, Tabby, Tamara, and Apple Pay.
questions.a4:
Within 7 days from the request expiration date:
1- You may request an extension if you haven't received three offers and none were suitable.
2- If you did not receive three offers and none were suitable, you may submit a new request for another car without extra fees.
3- You may request a refund if you did not receive three or more offers and did not click Interested in the offer on any received offers.

requestProcess.step1: A new request is created and sent to all participating dealerships.
requestProcess.step2: Dealerships can add their price offers along with available specifications and colors.
requestProcess.step3: The user selects the suitable offer and contacts the dealership after the offer submission period ends.
requestProcess.step4: The user's contact information will be shared with the provider of the best (first) offer.

validityPeriod.step1: The validity period of each offer is specified within the offer details.
validityPeriod.step2: The user must contact the dealership during the validity period to agree on the deposit payment method.

reservationDeposit.step1: The deposit amount is transferred to the dealership to secure the offered price.
reservationDeposit.step2: After agreement, the user must visit the dealership to complete the purchase process.

refundPolicy.step1: The deposit can be refunded within 7 days from the end of the request period.

fastSameDay: Fast delivery is available for this product today
offerConfirmedWithDeposit: The offer has been confirmed and a deposit for the vehicle has been paid. You can proceed to the showroom to complete the purchase procedures and receive the vehicle.
WillPayRest: The remaining amount will be paid at the showroom upon vehicle pickup.
forConfirmOrder: To confirm the offer, you must pay
FromCarPrice: of the vehicle price as a down payment, in order to reserve the vehicle and complete the remaining procedures at the showroom.
depositConfirmed: The offer has been confirmed and a deposit for the vehicle has been paid. You may proceed to the showroom to complete the purchase procedures and receive the vehicle.
nationalCodeError: Please make sure to use your correct national address code (e.g. RSFA1234)
